data.title: Research Guides at University of Maryland, Baltimore County
data.meta_description: Research Guides: Genre Lists: Children's Films
data.text:
Akeelah and the Bee

Akeelah decides to participate in a local spelling bee to avoid detention for her many absences, and then she wins.

Call Number: UMDVD 3336

Annie

Orphan Annie's hard-knock life changes when mayoral candidate Will Stacks takes her in.

Call Number: UMDVD 9134

Babe

A piglet destined for slaughter arrives at a farmyard and is adopted by an old sheep dog.

Call Number: UMDVD 2903

The Book of Life

Manolo is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart.

Call Number: UMDVD 9372

Brother Bear

Kenai sets out on a quest for revenge, but finds himself walking in some very different footsteps.

Call Number: UMDVD 8039

The Cat Returns

A young girl takes a fateful journey to the Kingdom of Cats after saving the life of a noble cat.

Call Number: UMDVD 2987

Chicken Little

Chicken Little and his band of misfit friends attempt to save the world without sending the town into a panic.

Call Number: UMDVD 8042

A Christmas Story

Young Ralphie mounts a full-scale Santa-begging campaign for a genuine air rifle.

Call Number: UMDVD 3792

The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch and The Wardrobe

The Pevensie siblings discover a different world that needs their help to escape the White Witch.

Call Number: UMDVD 1925

Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant

Darren is a regular teenage kid whose friend decides to become an apprentice to a traveling vampire.

Call Number: UMDVD 5499

Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs

A local scientist invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky.

Call Number: UMDVD 5465

The Fox and the Hound 1 & 2

Two friends discover that they are meant to be enemies when they grow up.

Call Number: UMDVD 6661

Happy Feet

The misfit Mumble cannot sing, and his toe-tapping talent is viewed with suspicion when fishing gets lean.

Call Number: UMDVD 2961

Home Alone

When eight-year-old Kevin McCallister's family went on vacation, they forgot one minor thing: Kevin!

Call Number: UMDVD 2982

It's the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown

Linus stays up all night to welcome the Great Pumpkin, and Charlie scares up some unusual Halloween loot.

Call Number: UMDVD 9433

The Iron Giant

A young boy meets a steel-eating giant who he tries to keep secret from everyone, including the government.

Call Number: UMDVD 4167

Jumanji

A mysterious board game with unimaginable powers falls into the unsuspecting hands of two children.

Call Number: UMDVD 5676

The Karate Kid

A handyman/martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied boy.

Call Number: UMDVD 5950

The Land Before Time

Littlefoot, Cera, Spike, Ducky, and Petrie go on their first adventure to find the lush, legendary Great Valley.

Call Number: UMDVD 9821

The LEGO Movie

Emmett is drafted into an epic quest to stop an evil tyrant, but is woefully underprepared.

Call Number: UMDVD 8966

The Magic School Bus: Space Adventures

Three episodes that feature a planetary field trip, gravity lessons, and the basics of aerodynamics.

Call Number: UMDVD 6641

Matilda

Matilda is a super-smart little girl neglected by her parents who realizes she has special powers.

Call Number: UMDVD 6688

Meet the Robinsons

The young inventor Louis sets off on a time-traveling journey to find the family he never knew.

Call Number: UMDVD 3589

Moana

The spirited teenager Moana meets the once-mighty demi-god Maui, and together they journey across the open ocean.

Call Number: UMDVD 10204 or UMBLU 131

Mulan

Mulan proves her worth by taking her father's place in the Imperial Army to defeat the Huns.

Call Number: UMDVD 685

My Neighbor Totoro

After moving to be near their ailing mother, two sisters are befriended by a variety of mysterious creatures.

Call Number: UMDVD 7421

The Neverending Story

The Nothing threatens to destroy Fantasia and its Child-Empress, and a young warrior sets out to save them.

Call Number: UMDVD 6650

Paddington

A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home and meets the kindly Brown family.

Call Number: UMDVD 9790

The Polar Express

A skeptical young boy takes an extraordinary train ride to the North Pole on a journey of self-discovery.

Call Number: UMDVD 4598

The Prince of Egypt

A tale of two brothers who, though best friends in their youth, become divided after a secret is revealed.

Call Number: UMDVD 4527

Professor Layton and the Eternal Diva

Layton and his loyal pupil Luke attend a performance by the professors' old student and face their toughest puzzle yet.

Call Number: UMDVD 6758

The Song of the Sea

Saoirse and her brother Ben encounter a host of ancient and mythical characters on their mystical journey.

Call Number: UMDVD 9263

The Spy Kids Trilogy

Three movies that detail the adventures of Carmen and Juni Cortez, children of international spies.

Call Number: UMDVD 9400

Tangled

Rapunzel, a spirited teen with an unlikely power, sets off on a journey with the bandit Flynn Rider.

Call Number: UMDVD 6048

Toy Story

The lives and adventures of a group of toys who come to life when their owner isn't around.

Call Number: UMDVD 2301

Warrior Twins

A retelling of the story of Lava and Kusa, the twin sons of Sita who begin a journey to discover their destiny.

Call Number: UMDVD 10238

Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory

Candy manufacturer Willy Wonka hides five golden tickets in five of his scrumptious candy bars.

Call Number: UMDVD 612
